title: Comments Analytics for NZZ (IBM watsonx)
desc: Auto-categorizes, summarizes, and gauges sentiment in reader comments—surfacing trending topics and points of disagreement. Built on IBM watsonx with guidance from IBM Zürich.
bullets: Orchestration: IBM Cloud Object Storage → watsonx Orchestrate → Discovery / watsonx.ai → database & updated metadata
Uses Intelligent Document Processing; simple analyst-friendly UI

title: GenAI Email Automation — RAG + LLM (Llama)
desc: Built a chatbot that drafts replies to customer emails using Retrieval-Augmented Generation: retrieves prior conversations/knowledge, embeds content, and uses a Llama-based model to generate context-aware answers.
bullets: Ingest previous customer email threads and internal knowledge; chunk and embed for retrieval.
For each incoming email, retrieve the most relevant history and articles to build a focused context window.
Generate draft replies with a Llama-based LLM; tuned prompts for tone and formatting.
Basic logging of queries, retrieved chunks, and outputs for iterative improvement.
